text: @Alyssafarah @ChanelRion @fema Hi - this tweet will be deleted soon but  PLEASE NOTE if Trump is re-elected we will be in a much worse position than we are today. The Coronavirus is linked to his refusal to release his tax returns. Do not vote for him and encourage others not to until he does.
